resources.string: To get toast scroll through this Welcome screen ->->
And press the button on next screen ->->
Press button START and enjoy toasts! :)
\t\t\tToast #1\n\nMay every day bring more happiness than yesterday.

Toast #2

Here’s to your health and a hearty wish for your happiness.
May every joy be yours and may bright stars of love shine over
and above you always.

Toast #3

May you always have some money
left from the money you have spent
to greet your landlord with a sneer
when he comes calling for the rent.

Toast #4

Call frequently,
Drink moderately,
Part friendly,
 Pay today,
Trust tomorrow.

Toast #5

Health to my body, wealth to my purse,
Heaven to my soul, and I wish you no worse.

Toast #6

Here’s to your bright eyes and here’s to mine.
Here’s to your sweet lips and here’s to mine.
Our eyes have met, our lips—not yet.
\t\t\tToast #7\n\nIf all the world were good and true,/nAnd you loved me, and I loved you,/nAnd you were sure that no one knew,/nI’d kiss—would you?
\t\t\tToast #8\n\nMay your luck ever spread like jelly on bread.
\t\t\tToast #9\n\nMay Dame Fortune ever smile on you, but never her daughter: Miss Fortune.
\t\t\tToast #10\n\nMay our sons have rich fathers and beautiful mothers.
